snippet.title: Threaded Dungeons - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Survive harsh, divided lands that afford no luxuries. Test your mettle in challenging turn-based, party-based combat. Scour perilous dungeons for powerful loot. Accept death as a close and ever-present companion. (Do not) give in to the whispers. Explore, despair, overcome.

Threaded Dungeons is a turn-based, party-based RPG with permadeath combat made by a solo dev. 

Wishlist now on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/3461810/
